content:
You are provided with a search query, find the top 5 relevant web pages to the query and output their URLs.
Open source software

I currently don't have the capability to browse the internet in real-time or access external websites to find the top 5 relevant web pages for a given query. However, I can suggest some popular open-source software platforms where you might find relevant resources:

1. **GitHub** - [https://github.com](https://github.com): A platform for hosting and collaborating on open-source software projects.

2. **SourceForge** - [https://sourceforge.net](https://sourceforge.net): A website for managing and downloading open-source projects.

3. **Open Source Initiative (OSI)** - [https://opensource.org](https://opensource.org): An organization that promotes and protects open-source software.

4. **GNU Project** - [https://www.gnu.org](https://www.gnu.org): A project that provides a collection of free software and promotes the use of open-source software.

5. **Apache Software Foundation** - [https://www.apache.org](https://www.apache.org): A non-profit organization supporting a number of open-source software projects.

These platforms and organizations are great starting points for exploring open-source software.
